Reviews.Title: Help Please cannot access from mobile device
Reviews.Author: David L. Feuer "SPACEGHOST"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item and cannot get it to function remotely from my smart phone Android HTC EVO or from my Samsung tablet.Help PleaseDlfdos@AOL.com

ProductInfo.Features:
Works with Wireless 802.11 b/g/n
Infrared lights provide a clear image in dark environments
Live view from your camera using tablets, smartphones, Mac or Windows computers
3x digital zoom captures close up view of your subject from a remote location
Pan and Tilt remotely using a computer or smartphone
ProductInfo.Name: Hawking Technology HNC5W HawkVision Wireless Universal Smart Cam Pro Video Camera (Black)
